OOC: Templar is actually functional. Could you repost so I can play 
out what I intended, please? The important thing is just to open the 
door.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord/BlackFang:
> 
> Windlord and Blackfang arrived and searchd the injured Maxinmal, 
> when they find him, they took of the fallen pod and carried him to 
a 
> safe distance where they started a quick check
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > The escape pod ran out of fuel and started tilting halfway in the 
> > atmosphere. Gravity shook it and pulled it directly towards a 
> rocky 
> > formation in the middle of an orchard.
> > 
> > Templar regained some semblance of consciousness as he saw clouds 
> > passing around him. He reflexively touched the controls and 
> > stabilized the pod just enough.
> > 
> > The fall, however, was far from stable. The pod hit the ground 
and 
> > leapt three or four timesin the air and finally stopped at the 
> base 
> > of the rocky hill.
> > 
> > All that remained of the pod was a battered hull...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Windlord:
> > >  
> > > Windlord looked Kenzo and reached him and said "My pal if you 
> > aren't 
> > > in conditions to follow up... come back base and use Cr's"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > -- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord picked the sigan and opened a com link to 
> KEnzo "Kenzo 
> > > a 
> > > > > Pod it's comming... if you're in conditions to come join 
> us... 
> > > it's 
> > > > > maximal...."
> > > > > 
> > > > > Windlord and Blackfang ran toward Pod's landing coordinates
> > > > > 
> > > > "On my way" Kenzo said. He transformed to chopter form, 
> through 
> > it 
> > > was
> > > > quite painful to do so in his damaged state.  But 
nevertheless 
> he 
> > > did
> > > > manage to take flight and head towards Windlord.
